stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements about the emergence of rock and roll music as a part of 1950’s popular culture in the United States is true?
choicesHtml: It relied heavily on Black musical traditions.
It adopted many of the big band tunes of the 1940’s.
It was a spin-off from British popular music of the time.
It was the first popular music broadcast nationally on radio.
It had little appeal in the South and West.
